name: Advanced Millennium Technologies
description:
Advanced Millennium Technologies, a leading global services company, provides consulting, implementation, business transformation and operational solutions for clients across the globe. AMT brings together the world's best technologies to address critical client business imperatives. AMT began its operation from Bangalore, India in the year 2002. We have also opened a full fledged open source development centre in Kochi, India during the year 2006.
* Great Web Programmers, Mobile Developers and Devops
* 300+ Customers since 2002 and 500+ Enterprise Software Solutions
* Great Prices
* Startup Friendly
* Agile development
Our service offerings include:
• Custom Web products and mobile application  Development & Maintenance.
• iOS and Android Native App Development. • node.js, angular.js, .NET, Java spring framework.
• Experts in IOT, Beacons and Smart TV App Development.
• Experts in NLP, Chatbot creation, AI (IBM Watson, DialogFlow, Wit.ai, Tensorflow)
• Salesforce Customization, Migration, Appexchange, Lightning & Integration
• CRM Conversion & Reengineering
• Cloud based Architectural Strategy & Design
• Blockchain & Enterprise Application Development
• Product Design
• Responsive and dynamic Web apps
• Security and Compliance
• Mobile Backend Engineering
• Quality Assurance and Testing
We practice Agile Methodology; which starts at product ideation followed by Consulting, Development, Manual / Automation Testing till Maintenance.
